baci-property.description: position wrt cartridge number: 0 = stow position, 1-10 = band1-10, 11 = WVR, 12 = PARK0, 13 = PARK1, 14 = not aligned

baci-property.description: address of the loads: 00 = ambient load, 1 = hot load, 2 = solar filter, 3 = QWP

monitor-point.description: address of the loads: 00 = ambient load, 1 = hot load, 2 = solar filter, 3 = QWP
